parameters.name: YEAR
parameters.description:
UTC year associated with the magnetic field
       samples Bx, By, Bz in each record.

parameters.name: DAY_OF_YEAR
parameters.description:
UTC day of year associated with the magnetic
       field samples Bx, By, Bz in each record.

parameters.name: HOUR
parameters.description:
UTC hour associated with the magnetic field
       samples Bx, By, Bz in each record.

parameters.name: MINUTE
parameters.description:
UTC minute associated with the magnetic 
       field samples Bx, By, Bz in each record.

parameters.name: SECOND
parameters.description:
UTC second associated with the magnetic 
       field samples Bx, By, Bz in each record.

parameters.name: TIME_TAG
parameters.description:
A derived value for the timetag associated
       with the x,y,z sample in each record. The derived value is created by
       the following formula:
           MET + 0.05 * delta_ts + (dt_sample)*(I-1) - latency. 
           MET is the mission elapsed time for the entire science packet.
           delta_ts is the delta time in seconds between the MET and
           the first sample in the downloaded science packet.
           dt_sample is the time between samples in seconds and given by 
           dt_sample = 1/sample_rate where sample_rate is the reported 
           sample rate in samples per second.
           I is the incremental counter for each data sample in the
           science packet. I=1 is the first sample in the packet. 
           Latency is the sample rate-dependent delay of the time stamp 
           recording relative to the actual time of observation.

parameters.name: X_MSO
parameters.description:
X position in Mercury solar orbital (MSO) 
           coordinates in units of kilometers.

parameters.name: Y_MSO
parameters.description:
Y position in Mercury solar orbital (MSO) 
           coordinates in units of kilometers.

parameters.name: Z_MSO
parameters.description:
Z position in Mercury solar orbital (MSO) 
           coordinates in units of kilometers.

parameters.name: BX_MSO
parameters.description:
X axis magnetic field value in Mercury 
            solar orbital (MSO) coordinates in units of nano-Tesla.

parameters.name: BY_MSO
parameters.description:
Y axis magnetic field value in Mercury 
            solar orbital (MSO) coordinates in units of nano-Tesla.

parameters.name: BZ_MSO
parameters.description:
Z axis magnetic field value in Mercury 
            solar orbital (MSO) coordinates in units of nano-Tesla.
